com.lukflug.panelstudio.tabgui

Class TabGUIContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.tabgui.TabGUIContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, TabGUIComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TabGUI

    public class TabGUIContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements TabGUIComponent
    Element of TabGUI. Renders a list of child components.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean childOpen
      Whether child component having focus.

      The Renderer for this component.
      protected int selected
      Index of the currently selected component.

      Object handling highlight animation.
